name: Laptop
description: High-performance laptop for work and gaming. Features 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, NVIDIA graphics, backlit keyboard. Ideal for professionals and gamers.

name: Smartphone
description: Latest model smartphone with amazing camera and battery life. Includes 128GB storage, 8GB RAM, 5G connectivity, OLED display.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with long battery life and deep bass. Bluetooth 5.0, foldable, comfortable for long use.

name: Smart Watch
description: Track your fitness, notifications, and sleep patterns. Water-resistant, compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: High precision gaming mouse with RGB lights and customizable buttons. Ergonomic design for long sessions.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Mechanical keyboard for typing and gaming. Tactile switches, RGB backlight, durable design.

name: Monitor
description: 24-inch full HD monitor with crisp display, adjustable stand, HDMI and DisplayPort connectivity.

name: Tablet
description: Portable tablet for reading, media, and light gaming. High-resolution screen, long battery life.

name: External Hard Drive
description: 1TB external hard drive for backup and storage. USB 3.0, compact and durable design.

name: Webcam
description: HD webcam for video conferencing and streaming. Plug-and-play, clear video, built-in mic.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, long battery life, waterproof design for outdoor use.

name: Printer
description: All-in-one printer for home or office. Print, scan, and copy with high-quality resolution, wireless ready.

name: Router
description: High-speed Wi-Fi router for home network. Supports multiple devices and stable connection.

name: Projector
description: HD projector for movies and presentations. Portable, supports HDMI and USB media input.

name: Smart Light
description: Wi-Fi controlled smart LED light. Adjustable colors, voice control compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Track your steps, heart rate, calories burned and sleep. Water-resistant, lightweight, long battery life.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive virtual reality headset for gaming and simulations. Adjustable straps, comfortable fit.

name: Drone
description: Quadcopter drone with camera. 4K video, stable flight, beginner-friendly controls.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Control your home temperature remotely. Wi-Fi enabled, energy-saving, compatible with multiple zones.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Fast boiling electric kettle with auto shut-off and 1.7L capacity. Stainless steel, safe and easy to clean.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Automatic coffee maker for home. Brew fresh coffee quickly, programmable settings, and keep-warm function.

name: Blender
description: High-speed kitchen blender. Smoothies, sauces, soups, easy clean design, 600W motor.

name: Air Fryer
description: Oil-free air fryer for healthy cooking. Adjustable temperature, 3L capacity, easy to clean basket.

name: Air Conditioner
description: Split AC for home cooling. Energy-efficient, remote control, adjustable modes, quiet operation.

name: Heater
description: Portable electric heater. Safe and efficient, adjustable heat settings, ideal for home or office.

name: Water Purifier
description: RO water purifier for clean drinking water. 7-stage purification, easy installation, maintenance friendly.

name: Gaming Chair
description: Ergonomic chair for gaming. Adjustable height, lumbar support, breathable fabric, 360-degree swivel.

name: Desk Lamp
description: LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and angle. Touch control, energy-saving, modern design.

name: Backpack
description: Waterproof backpack for travel. Multiple compartments, padded laptop section, lightweight design.

name: Sunglasses
description: UV protection stylish sunglasses. Lightweight, polarized lenses, perfect for outdoor activities.

name: Shoes
description: Comfortable running shoes. Breathable fabric, cushioned sole, suitable for daily workouts.

name: Jacket
description: Winter jacket for cold weather. Waterproof, insulated, stylish design, multiple pockets.

name: Hat
description: Stylish hat for summer. Lightweight, breathable, adjustable size, protects from sun.

name: Watch
description: Luxury wrist watch. Elegant design, durable materials, water-resistant, precise quartz movement.

name: Wallet
description: Leather wallet for men. Multiple compartments, RFID protection, compact design.

name: Perfume
description: Fragrant perfume. Long-lasting scent, elegant bottle, suitable for daily wear.
